author: Ryan Daws
description:
Privacy firm Proton is joining a lawsuit against Apple on behalf of app developers that claim to have been squeezed by App Store policies. Proton makes it clear this wasn’t a decision they took lightly. So, why now? They point to a string of recent legal blows against Apple. A European court slapped Apple with... Read more »

The post Proton joins App Store lawsuit against Apple appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Proton joins App Store lawsuit against Apple
